text:
[Alfred] 2 
[Alfred] 
[Alfred] 
Angry 
[Alfred] EmoTalk 
I will be your sword and shield, Divine One. And 
a flower. What brings more comfort than that?

[Alfred] 2 
[Alfred] 
[Alfred] Strike 
[Alfred] EmoTalk 
I'm glad we found Céline, but I'm worried about 
the castle. Let's head there as soon as we can.

[Alfred] 2 
[Alfred] 
[Alfred] 
Smile 
[Alfred] EmoTalk 
I can't thank you enough for saving Firene, but 
let me start by taking you to the shrine.

[Alfred] 2 
[Alfred] 
[Alfred] Sad 
[Alfred] EmoTalk 
As royalty, I feel partly responsible for letting 
the bandit situation get this out of hand.

[Alfred] 2 
[Alfred] 
[Alfred] 
Angry 
[Alfred] EmoTalk 
There's something strange going on with her... 
Let's just stay here until your nerves settle.

[Alfred] 2 
[Alfred] 
[Alfred] 
Angry 
[Alfred] EmoTalk 
I wonder how they're doing back in Firene. And 
what's Elusia─sorry, the Fell Dragon─up to?

[Alfred] 2 
[Alfred] 
[Alfred] 
Smile 
[Alfred] EmoTalk 
You mean a lot to us. Even if you tried to flee, 
I'd run after you to make sure you knew that.

[Alfred] 2 
[Alfred] 
[Alfred] 
Smile 
[Alfred] EmoTalk 
I feel bad for the you from a thousand years 
ago. I hope everything turns out OK.

[Anna] 2 
[Anna] 
[Anna] 
Smile 
[Anna] EmoTalk 
Thanks, Divine One. Glad to sign on with you! 
I was getting kinda lonely on my own.

[Bunet] 2 
[Bunet] 
[Bunet] 
Smile 
[Bunet] EmoTalk 
Thank you for assisting our band of Sentinels. 
Let us savor the taste of victory together.

[Boucheron] 2 

[Boucheron] 

[Boucheron] Sad 

[Boucheron] EmoTalk 
Poor Queen Lumera. When word gets out, there 
will be mourning all over Firene.

[Boucheron] 2 

[Boucheron] 

[Boucheron] Sad 

[Boucheron] EmoTalk 
I feel like crying. But tears won't bring back 
this town. That'll take hard work.

[Byleth] 2 
[Byleth] 
[Byleth] 
Smile 
[Byleth] EmoTalk 
Your command was flawless, as was your team 
coordination. I've learned much from this battle.

[Celica] 2 
[Celica] 
[Celica] 
Smile 
[Celica] EmoTalk 
The loss may be mine, but it was a fine battle. 
We should do well together going forward.

[Céline] 2 

[Céline] 
[Céline] Sad 
[Céline] EmoTalk 
Why would the Elusians invade Firene? I hope 
that Mother is safe at the castle.

[Céline] 2 

[Céline] 
[Céline] 
Smile 
[Céline] EmoTalk 
My mother is safe. Thank you for all you have 
done for us. You shall have my aid in return.

[Céline] 2 

[Céline] 
[Céline] Sad 
[Céline] EmoTalk 
I can't stand to see all of this! And Mother is 
going to feel devastated for our people.

[Céline] 2 

[Céline] 
[Céline] 
Smile 
[Céline] EmoTalk 
Your lineage does not change that you saved 
me and all of Firene. I shall stand by you.

[Céline] 2 

[Céline] 
[Céline] Shy 
[Céline] EmoTalk 
I am so relieved you returned to us. I feared 
I might never get to speak with you again.

[Chloé] 2 
[Chloé] 
[Chloé] 
Smile 
[Chloé] EmoTalk 
Hello, I'm Chloé. I can't thank you enough for 
saving Princess Céline's life.

[Chloé] 2 
[Chloé] 
[Chloé] Sad 
[Chloé] EmoTalk 
This village used to be so charming, like it came 
straight from a fairy tale. And now look at it.

[Citrinne] 2 

[Citrinne] 

[Citrinne] Shy 
I'm glad we forced the Elusian army to retreat... 
but I fear for the castle. It's like a home to me.

[Clanne] 2 
[Clanne] 
[Clanne] 
Smile 
[Clanne] EmoTalk 
I was a bit worried, but we made it through! 
We're safe because of you, Divine One.

[Clanne] 
Relax 
Hey...what happened to that guy who popped 
out of your ring?

[Clanne] 2 
[Clanne] 
[Clanne] 
Smile 
[Clanne] EmoTalk 
I was helpful, yeah? At least a little? I'm going 
to keep being helpful for you, Divine One.

[Clanne] 2 
[Clanne] 
[Clanne] Sad 
[Clanne] EmoTalk 
Queen Lumera was always so nice to me. 
But now... Now I'll never see her smile again...

[Clanne] 2 
[Clanne] 
[Clanne] 
Smile 
[Clanne] EmoTalk 
It doesn't matter whose child you actually are. 
I'll still protect you because...well, you're you.

[Clanne] 2 
[Clanne] 
[Clanne] 
Smile 
[Clanne] EmoTalk 
It's so amazing that you've become an Emblem. 
You looked just like Queen Lumera!

[Clanne] 2 
[Clanne] 
[Clanne] Shy 
[Clanne] EmoTalk 
Queen Lumera was smiling, wasn't she? I think 
that was the happiest I've ever seen her.

[Diamant] 2 
[Diamant] 
[Diamant] 
Angry 
[Diamant] EmoTalk 
The time has finally come... When preparations 
are done, let's head straight for the border.

[Diamant] 2 
[Diamant] 
[Diamant] 
Angry 
[Diamant] EmoTalk 
I can't believe King Hyacinth abducted Father... 
We have to get to Destinea Cathedral. Hurry!

[Diamant] 2 
[Diamant] 
[Diamant] Serious 
I can't stop thinking about everything that's 
happened... I still have a long road ahead of me.

[Diamant] 2 
[Diamant] 
[Diamant] 
Angry 
[Diamant] EmoTalk 
The survivors are being counted. We may have 
lost as many as we saved... It's hard to say.

[Diamant] 2 
[Diamant] 
[Diamant] 
Smile 
[Diamant] EmoTalk 
I'm glad Saphir found us. Hearing that Brodia 
Castle is safe and secure puts my mind at ease.

[Diamant] 2 
[Diamant] 
[Diamant] 
Angry 
[Diamant] EmoTalk 
Don't worry. We're right here beside you...and 
we'll help you become a true Divine Dragon.

[Eirika] 2 

[Eirika] 

[Eirika] 
Smile 

[Eirika] EmoTalk 
It was inspiring to see all of you, fighting as one. 
I must double my efforts to match your own.

[Etie] 2 

[Etie] 

[Etie] Sad 

[Etie] EmoTalk 
Thanks for agreeing to help us. I hope you can 
do something to save Firene.

[Etie] 2 

[Etie] 

[Etie] Pain 

[Etie] EmoTalk 
It'll take a long time to rebuild this place. But I 
think we can get it looking just as good as it did.

[Ève] 2 
[Ève] 
[Ève] 
Relax 
[Ève] EmoTalk 
Please get some rest here before you set out. 
I will be praying for your safety.

[Fogado] 2 

[Fogado] 

[Fogado] 
Smile 

[Fogado] EmoTalk 
Thanks for helping us defeat those monsters! 
No way we could've done it without you.

[Fogado] 2 

[Fogado] 

[Fogado] 
Angry 

[Fogado] EmoTalk 
Hate to admit it, but they were smart to hit us 
while we were away. Now, let's get back there.

[Fogado] 2 

[Fogado] 

[Fogado] 
Smile 

[Fogado] EmoTalk 
Things were touch-and-go there for a bit. But 
you and Timerra played it cool. Real nice work.

[Fogado] 2 

[Fogado] 

[Fogado] 
Smile 

[Fogado] EmoTalk 
The people of Solm don't care about origins. We 
care about the you NOW. And you are amazing.

[Fogado] 2 

[Fogado] 

[Fogado] Sad 

[Fogado] EmoTalk 
I'm happy you're back, but take it easy, will ya? 
What if you'd really died?! I couldn't take it!

[Framme] 2 
[Framme] 
[Framme] 
Smile 
[Framme] EmoTalk 
You looked so incredible on the battlefield! 
Of course you did─you're the Divine Dragon!

[Framme] Shy 
But did you get injured at all? I hope not! 
If you need healing, though, I'm fantastic at it.

[Framme] 2 
[Framme] 
[Framme] 
Smile 
[Framme] EmoTalk 
Divine One! You looked sooo amazing! I swear, 
I'm gonna get stronger, too, especially for you.

[Framme] 2 
[Framme] 
[Framme] Sad 
[Framme] EmoTalk 
I'm sorry, Divine One. I wish I could have healed 
her. You were just reunited too. It's so unfair.

[Framme] 2 
[Framme] 
[Framme] 
Smile 
[Framme] EmoTalk 
You ARE a Divine Dragon to me! Even now. No, 
especially now! You're amazing no matter what.

[Framme] 2 
[Framme] 
[Framme] Sad 
[Framme] EmoTalk 
Divine One! I was sooo worried! I'm just so glad 
you're back. I─ I─ I can't stop crying...

[Framme] 2 
[Framme] 
[Framme] Shy 
[Framme] EmoTalk 
I─ I won't cry like before. Queen Lumera will 
always be with you, Divine One. I just know it.

[Goldmary] 2 
[Goldmary] 
[Goldmary] 
Smile 
[Goldmary] EmoTalk 
Thank you for allowing me to join you. I'm sorry 
if my presence makes your other allies obsolete.

[Hortensia] 2 
[Hortensia] 
[Hortensia] Shy 
[Hortensia] EmoTalk 
I was worried I'd never see these two again. 
Ah, I'm so relieved...

[Hortensia] 2 
[Hortensia] 
[Hortensia] Sad 
[Hortensia] EmoTalk 
Thank you, Divine One. Starting now, I'll be 
on the right side─for you and for Ivy.

[Hortensia] 2 
[Hortensia] 
[Hortensia] 
Angry 
I wonder why she came here. But as long as she 
isn't coming after me, I guess it doesn't matter.

[Hortensia] 2 
[Hortensia] 
[Hortensia] Die 
Goodbye, Father. Forever this time.

[Hortensia] 2 
[Hortensia] 
[Hortensia] 
Angry 
[Hortensia] EmoTalk 
So what if you were born a Fell Dragon? I used 
to worship the Fell Dragon. Anyone can change.

[Hortensia] 2 
[Hortensia] 
[Hortensia] Sad 
[Hortensia] EmoTalk 
Seeing you as one of the Corrupted, just like my 
father... I was worried you'd never come back.

[Ike] 2 
[Ike] 
[Ike] 
Smile 
[Ike] EmoTalk 
My father taught me the way of the sword. 
To think I'd lose... I've still got a lot to learn.

[Ivy] 2 

[Ivy] 
[Ivy] Sad 
[Ivy] EmoTalk 
What are you planning, Hortensia?

[Ivy] 2 

[Ivy] 
[Ivy] 
Relax 
[Ivy] EmoTalk 
I'm glad to hear it, Hortensia. Divine One, my 
sincerest thanks for welcoming my sister.

[Ivy] 2 

[Ivy] 
[Ivy] Die 
I'm sorry, Father... I was certain we could find 
a way through this...

[Ivy] 2 

[Ivy] 
[Ivy] Status 
[Ivy] EmoTalk 
This is strange to say, but I think seeing my 
father that way has helped me find closure.

[Ivy] 2 

[Ivy] 
[Ivy] 
Angry 
[Ivy] EmoTalk 
We mustn't linger here. Let us make haste to 
Elusia Castle.

[Ivy] 2 

[Ivy] 
[Ivy] Sad 
[Ivy] EmoTalk 
You will always be the Divine Dragon to me. 
Please remember that─and please stay with us.

[Jade] 2 

[Jade] 
[Jade] Normal 
[Jade] EmoTalk 
I should make a proper introduction. I'm Jade. 
I won't rest until King Morion is safe again.

[Jean] 父親 2 
[Jean] 父親 
$ [Jean] 父親 
Smile 
( [Jean] 父親 EmoTalk 
Take good care of Jean, Divine One. He'll grow 
into a fine young man.

[Jean] 母親 2 
[Jean] 母親 
[Jean] 母親 Shy 
( [Jean] 母親 EmoTalk

But if it's what he wants, he has my support.

[Jean] 2 
[Jean] 
[Jean] 
Smile 
[Jean] EmoTalk 
Thanks for taking me along, Divine One. If I try 
hard, I'm sure I can make myself useful.

[Corrin] 2 
[Corrin] 
[Corrin] 
Smile 
[Corrin] EmoTalk 
Incredible... I was overwhelmed by your attack. 
It's an honor to have faced you in combat.

[Lapis] 2 
[Lapis] 
[Lapis] Shy 
[Lapis] EmoTalk 
So sorry for being rude earlier, Divine One. 
I hope you'll support Prince Alcryst...and me!

[Leif] 2 
[Leif] 
[Leif] 
Smile 
[Leif] EmoTalk 
You conquered the trial, and now I feel a new 
power within me. Thank you.

[Lyn] 2 
[Lyn] 
[Lyn] 
Smile 
[Lyn] EmoTalk 
You're even stronger than I first thought. I best 
get to training if I'm to be a match for you.

[Lindon] 2 

[Lindon] 
[Lindon] 
Smile 
[Lindon] EmoTalk 
I rejoice to hear that Princess Ivy is alive. Thank

[Louis] 2 
[Louis] 
[Louis] 
Smile 
[Louis] EmoTalk 
The Divine One, I presume? I am Louis. Thank 
you for coming to my princess's aid.

[Louis] 2 
[Louis] 
[Louis] Serious 
[Louis] EmoTalk 
Horrible! Just horrible! The fires are out now, 
but what possessed them to do all this?

[Lucina] 2 
[Lucina] 
[Lucina] 
Smile 
[Lucina] EmoTalk 
Well done. You're sure to carve out a bright,

[Lumera] 2 

[Lumera] 
[Lumera] 
Smile 
[Lumera] EmoTalk 
I am so very, very happy to see you. It's like

[Lumera] Sad

There may be more enemies lurking about.

[Lumera] 2 

[Lumera] 
[Lumera] 
Smile 
[Lumera] EmoTalk 
Please rest easy for today. We'll chat in 
the morning.

[Marth] 2 
[Marth] 
[Marth] 
Smile 
[Marth] EmoTalk 
Impressive. You are all quite strong and valiant. 
It is an honor to fight alongside you.

[Mauvier] 2 
[Mauvier] 
[Mauvier] 
Smile 
[Mauvier] EmoTalk 
Lady Veyle, Divine Dragon, it is good to see you 
have returned. You were both outstanding.

[Mauvier] 2 
[Mauvier] 
[Mauvier] Die 
"The Four Hounds are family." There was truth 
in those words. But we could not end as family.

[Merrin] 2 
[Merrin] 
[Merrin] 
Smile 
[Merrin] EmoTalk 
Wow, the Divine Dragon? I adore dragons. If the

[Micaiah] 2 
[Micaiah] 
[Micaiah] 
Smile 
[Micaiah] EmoTalk 
Do you feel it? Our bond is closer than before, 
and my power flows to you more freely.

[Timerra] 2 

[Timerra] 

[Timerra] Sad 

[Timerra] EmoTalk 
Divine One, I'm super worried about my mom. 
Let's get to the palace as soon as we can, OK?

[Timerra] 2 

[Timerra] 

[Timerra] 
Smile 

[Timerra] EmoTalk 
Thanks, Divine One. We won because you 
insisted on protecting the rings and our queen.

[Timerra] 2 

[Timerra] 

[Timerra] Sad 

[Timerra] EmoTalk 
So, that girl is the Fell Dragon's daughter? 
Divine One, everyone...please, be extra careful.

[Timerra] 2 

[Timerra] 

[Timerra] 
Smile 

[Timerra] EmoTalk 
Nothing's changed as far as I'm concerned. The 
you that's right in front of me─that's all I need.

[Morion] 2 

[Morion] 
[Morion] Status 
[Morion] EmoTalk 
Once the preparations are complete, we will 
head for the Elusian border without delay.

村人おじいさん

村人Ｂ

Smile

村人Ｃ 
村人Ｃ 
Smile

村人おばさん 
$ 村人おばさん 
Smile 
( 村人おばさん EmoTalk

[Pandreo] 2 

[Pandreo] 
[Pandreo] Surprise 
[Pandreo] EmoTalk

[Panette] 2 

[Panette] 
[Panette] Status 
[Panette] EmoTalk

[Rosado] 2 

[Rosado] 
[Rosado] 
Smile

[Roy] 2 
[Roy] 
[Roy] 
Smile 
[Roy] EmoTalk

[Saphir] 2 

[Saphir] 

[Saphir] 
Smile 

[Saphir] EmoTalk

[Seadall] 2 

[Seadall] 
[Seadall] 
Smile 
[Seadall] EmoTalk

[Sigurd] 2 

[Sigurd] 
[Sigurd] 
Smile 
[Sigurd] EmoTalk 
You have grown strong, to overcome this trial.

[Alcryst] 2 

[Alcryst] 

[Alcryst] Sad 

[Alcryst] EmoTalk 
Ah, I can't stand here and do nothing. I need to

[Alcryst] 2 

[Alcryst] 

[Alcryst] Normal 

[Alcryst] EmoTalk 
A battle with Elusia... I can't let anything happen

[Alcryst] 2 

[Alcryst] 

[Alcryst] Sad 

[Alcryst] EmoTalk 
Father... No...

[Alcryst] 2 

[Alcryst] 

[Alcryst] Sad 

[Alcryst] EmoTalk

[Alcryst] 2 

[Alcryst] 

[Alcryst] 
Smile 

[Alcryst] EmoTalk 
Your lineage doesn't matter to me, Divine One.

[Alcryst] 2 

[Alcryst] 

[Alcryst] Shy 

[Alcryst] EmoTalk

[Amber] 2 

[Amber] 
[Amber] 
Smile 
[Amber] EmoTalk 
It's you! The Divine Dragon! It's such a thrill to

[Vander] 2 

[Vander] 

[Vander] 
Smile 

[Vander] EmoTalk 
It heartens me to see you and Queen Lumera 
reunited at last.

The memory loss may have come as a surprise, 
but she seems elated nonetheless.

[Vander] 2 

[Vander] 

[Vander] 
Smile 

[Vander] EmoTalk 
You fought magnificently. Going forward, I will 
continue alongside you as your knight.

[Vander] 2 

[Vander] 

[Vander] Sad 

[Vander] EmoTalk 
I...cannot make up for what you've lost! 
But I am at your side, Divine One.

[Vander] 2 

[Vander] 

[Vander] Normal 

[Vander] EmoTalk 
We must not let the Fell Dragon regain power. 
Let us make haste for Destinea Cathedral...

[Vander] 2 

[Vander] 

[Vander] Normal 

[Vander] EmoTalk 
Elusia will soon be in sight. Once your rounds 
are done, make ready for landfall.

[Vander] 2 

[Vander] 

[Vander] 
Relax 

[Vander] EmoTalk 
You remain the Divine Dragon. I will forever 
serve at your side...just as I always have.

[Vander] 2 

[Vander] 

[Vander] 
Smile 

[Vander] EmoTalk 
Queen Lumera's prayer has been answered. She 
must be pleased you've received the ring.

[Vander] 2 

[Vander] 

[Vander] Die 
Queen Lumera... At the end, she must have felt 
great joy knowing you'd become an Emblem.

[Veyle] 2 

[Veyle] 
[Veyle] 
Smile 
[Veyle] EmoTalk 
I feel like I have a new life. I have friends and 
a dream... It's all so wonderful!

[Veyle] 2 

[Veyle] 
[Veyle] Sad 
So, the Four Hounds are...no more. I don't have 
any regrets. Still...I am a little sad.

[Veyle] 2 

[Veyle] 
[Veyle] Sad 
[Veyle] EmoTalk 
I wonder if any of our other siblings are here? 
We have to survive this...for us and for them.

[Veyle] 2 

[Veyle] 
[Veyle] Sad 
[Veyle] EmoTalk

I'm glad you got to see the real her in the end.

[Yunaka] 2 
[Yunaka] 
[Yunaka] 
Smile 
[Yunaka] EmoTalk
